transforms.code:
# calculate nights if repeateEvent false
	day = self.getChild("root").getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("StartsOn_Date_Flex").getChild("Starts_On_Date").props.params.date	
	Sunday = False
	Monday = False
	Tuesday = False
	Wednesday = False
	Thursday = False
	Friday = False
	Saturday = False
	weekday = system.date.getDayOfWeek(day)
	if weekday == 7: 
		Saturday = True
	elif weekday == 1:
		Sunday = True
	elif weekday == 2:
		Monday = True
	elif weekday == 3:
		Tuesday = True
	elif weekday == 4:
		Wednesday = True
	elif weekday == 5:
		Thursday = True
	elif weekday == 6:
		Friday = True					
	nights = 0
	if Sunday: nights += 1
	if Monday: nights += 2
	if Tuesday: nights += 4
	if Wednesday: nights += 8
	if Thursday: nights +=16
	if Friday: nights += 32
	if Saturday: nights += 64	
	nightsForNonRepeateEvent = nights
##########
	IsUpdate = self.params.IsUpdate
	self.custom.PrevStartsOn = None
	if IsUpdate == True:
		eventId = self.params.event_id
		parameter = {'eventId':eventId}
		result = system.db.runNamedQuery('Event/ParticipantEvents/Detail/Get_Events_ByEventID',parameter)
		# get list of dateSelectionDays
		if result.getValueAt(0,'dateSelectionDays') != None and result.getValueAt(0,'dateSelectionDays') != '' and result.getValueAt(0,'dateSelectionDays') != 'None':
			dateSelectionDays = (result.getValueAt(0,'dateSelectionDays')).replace('[','')
			dateSelectionDays = dateSelectionDays.replace(']','')
			list = dateSelectionDays.split(',')
		else:
			list = []
		dateSelectionDays = []
		if len(list)>0:
			for k in range(0,len(list)):
				day = list[k]
				if day != None and day != '':
					dateSelectionDays.append(int(day))
					
		# get list of facilitator
		if result.getValueAt(0,'facilitatorHumanId') != None and result.getValueAt(0,'facilitatorHumanId') != '' and result.getValueAt(0,'facilitatorHumanId') != 'None':
			facilitatorHumanIds = (result.getValueAt(0,'facilitatorHumanId')).replace('[','')
			facilitatorHumanIds = facilitatorHumanIds.replace(']','')
			list = facilitatorHumanIds.split(',')
		else:
			list = []
		facilitatorHumanIds = []
		if len(list) > 0:
			for k in range(0,len(list)):
				facilitatorHumanId = list[k]
				if facilitatorHumanId != None and facilitatorHumanId != '':
					facilitatorHumanIds.append(int(facilitatorHumanId))
							
		if result.getRowCount() > 0:
			if result.getValueAt(0,'timeRetired') != None:
				ParticipantActive = 0
			else:
				ParticipantActive = 1
			EventInfo ={
						'id':result.getValueAt(0,'id'),
						'categoryId':result.getValueAt(0,'categoryId'),
						'category':result.getValueAt(0,'category'),
						'name':result.getValueAt(0,'name'),
						'startsOn':result.getValueAt(0,'startsOn'),
						'startsOnDB':result.getValueAt(0,'startsOn'),
						'endsOn':result.getValueAt(0,'endsOn'),
						'allDayEvent':result.getValueAt(0,'allDayEvent'),
						'description':result.getValueAt(0,'description'),
						'repeatFrequencyTypeId':result.getValueAt(0,'repeatFrequencyTypeId'),
						'dateSelectionPattern':result.getValueAt(0,'dateSelectionPattern'),
						'dateSelectionPatternDB':result.getValueAt(0,'dateSelectionPattern'),
						'dateSelectionDays':dateSelectionDays,
						'weekdays':dateSelectionDays,
						'weekdays_db':dateSelectionDays,
						'timeCreated':result.getValueAt(0,'timeCreated'),
						'timeRetired':result.getValueAt(0,'timeRetired'),
						'points':result.getValueAt(0,'points'),
						'facilitatorEmployeeId':facilitatorHumanIds,
						'IsEventRepeat':result.getValueAt(0,'IsEventRepeat'),
						'repeatDateUntil':result.getValueAt(0,'repeatDateUntil')
						,'scheduledWeekdays':result.getValueAt(0,'scheduledWeekdays')
						,'duration_hours':result.getValueAt(0,'duration_hours')
						,'locationId':result.getValueAt(0,'locationId')
						,'ParticipantActive':ParticipantActive
						}
#			# set week days 
#			self.custom.weekdays = dateSelectionDays
			# add locations
#			dataset = system.db.runNamedQuery("Event/ParticipantEvents/Detail/Get_SelectedLocations_ForEvent",{'EventId':self.params.event_id})
#			locations = []
#			if dataset.getRowCount() > 0:
#				for i in range(0,dataset.getRowCount()):
#					location = dataset.getValueAt(i,'locationId')
#					locations.append(location)
#			self.custom.Locations = locations
		else:
			EventInfo ={
						'id':None,
						'categoryId':None,
						'category':None,
						'name':None,
						'startsOn':system.date.now(),
						'startsOnDB':None,
						'endsOn': system.date.addDays(system.date.now(), 1),
						'allDayEvent':None,
						'description':'',
						'repeateFrequencyTypeId':None,
						'dateSelectionPattern':None,
						'dateSelectionPatternDB':None,
						'dateSelectionDays':[],
						'weekdays':[],
						'weekdays_db':[],
						'timeCreated':None,
						'timeRetired':None,
						'points':None,
						'facilitatorEmployeeId':None,
						'IsEventRepeat':None,
						'repeatDateUntil':None
						,'scheduledWeekdays':None #nightsForNonRepeateEvent
						,'duration_hours':1
						,'locationId':None
						,'ParticipantActive':None
						}
#			self.custom.Locations = []
#			# set week days 
#			self.custom.weekdays = []
	else:
		EventInfo ={
					'id':None,
					'categoryId':None,
					'category':None,
					'name':None,
					'startsOn':system.date.now(),
					'startsOnDB':None,
					'endsOn': system.date.now(),
					'allDayEvent':None,
					'description':'',
					'repeateFrequencyTypeId':None,
					'dateSelectionPattern':None,
					'dateSelectionPatternDB':None,
					'dateSelectionDays':[],
					'weekdays':[],
					'weekdays_db':[],
					'timeCreated':None,
					'timeRetired':None,
					'points':None,
					'facilitatorEmployeeId':None,
					'IsEventRepeat':None,
					'repeatDateUntil':None
					,'scheduledWeekdays':None #nightsForNonRepeateEvent
					,'duration_hours':1
					,'locationId':None
					,'ParticipantActive':1
					}
#		self.custom.Locations = []
#		# set week days 
#		self.custom.weekdays = []
	return EventInfo

onChange.script: self.refreshBinding('custom.weekdays')

if currentValue.value != None and currentValue.value != '':
		self.params.event_name = currentValue.value

self.getChild("root").getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("Schedule_Flex").getChild("Calendar").getChild("Table").props.params.startDate = currentValue.value
	#self.parent.parent.getChild("Schedule_Flex").getChild("Calendar").getChild("Table").props.params.startDate
	#	system.perspective.print(previousValue.value)
	#	system.perspective.print(currentValue.value)
#	if self.view.params.IsUpdate == False:
#		if previousValue != None and system.date.getDayOfYear(previousValue.value) in (self.view.custom.schedule):
#			(self.view.custom.schedule).remove(system.date.getDayOfYear(previousValue.value))
#		if system.date.getDayOfYear(currentValue.value) not in (self.view.custom.schedule):
#			(self.view.custom.schedule).append(system.date.getDayOfYear(currentValue.value))
	duration = self.getChild("root").getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("Duration_Flex").getChild("Duration").props.params.value
	if duration == None or duration == "":
		duration = 0
	endsOn = system.date.addHours(currentValue.value, duration)
	self.getChild("root").getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("EndsOn_Flex").getChild("Ends_On").props.params.date = endsOn

transforms.code:
dataset = value
	schedule = []
	duration = 0
	if dataset.getRowCount() > 0:
		for i in range(0,dataset.getRowCount()):
			startDate = dataset.getValueAt(i,'startsOn')
			endDate = dataset.getValueAt(i,'endsOn')
			###
			if startDate not in schedule:
				schedule.append(startDate)
			###
			duration = system.date.daysBetween(startDate, endDate)
	self.getChild("root").getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("Schedule_Flex").getChild("Calendar").getChild("Table").props.params.duration = duration
	return schedule

if value is not None:
		if value == 1: ## weekly
			return 0 
		elif value == 2: ## bi weekly
			return 1
		elif value in [3,4,5,6,7]: ## monthly
			return 2
		else:
			return 3 ## specific dates
	else:
		return 3	# specific dates

onChange.script: self.custom.PrevStartsOn = None

duration_old = self.view.custom.EventData.duration_hours
	if duration_old != currentValue.value:
		self.view.custom.EventData.duration_hours = currentValue.value
	#pass
#	startsOn = self.parent.parent.getChild("StartsOn_Flex").getChild("Starts_On").props.params.date
#	endsOn = self.parent.parent.getChild("EndsOn_Flex").getChild("Ends_On").props.params.date

#	if endsOn != newDate:
#		self.parent.parent.getChild("EndsOn_Flex").getChild("Ends_On").props.params.date = newDate

if self.parent.parent.getChild("Schedule_Flex").getChild("EndDate").getChild("Ends_On").props.params.date == None:
		self.view.custom.endDateCalender = currentValue.value
#	StartsOn = self.parent.parent.getChild("StartsOn_Flex").getChild("Starts_On").props.params.date
#	EndsOn = currentValue.value
#	duration_old = self.parent.parent.getChild("Duration_Flex").getChild("Duration").props.params.value
#	duration = system.date.hoursBetween(StartsOn,EndsOn)
#	if duration_old != duration:
#		self.parent.parent.getChild("Duration_Flex").getChild("Duration").props.params.value = duration

if previousValue != None and previousValue.value == False and currentValue.value == True:
		endDate = self.parent.parent.getChild("EndsOn_Flex").getChild("Ends_On").props.params.date
		#if self.view.params.IsUpdate == False:
		repeatDate = self.parent.parent.getChild("Schedule_Flex").getChild("EndDate").getChild("Ends_On").props.params.date
		if repeatDate == None or repeatDate == '':
			self.parent.parent.getChild("Schedule_Flex").getChild("EndDate").getChild("Ends_On").props.params.date = system.date.addDays(endDate, 1)
			(self.view.custom.calendarFiller).append(self.parent.parent.getChild("StartsOn_Date_Flex").getChild("Starts_On_Date").props.params.date)
	
	# not allow to edit if event attendance
	if  previousValue != None and previousValue.value == True and currentValue.value == False:
		eventId = self.view.params.event_id
		startsOn = self.parent.parent.getChild("StartsOn_Date_Flex").getChild("Starts_On_Date").props.params.date
		query = "select ea.id as 'attendance' from participant.EventAttendance ea LEFT JOIN [participant].[EventSchedule] e ON ea.scheduleId=e.id WHERE e.timeRetired IS NULL and ea.timeRetired IS NULL and e.eventId =" + str(eventId) + " and FORMAT(e.startsOn,'yyyy-MM-dd') != '" + str(system.date.format(startsOn,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')) + "'"
		result = system.db.runPrepQuery(query)
		if result.getRowCount() > 0:
			system.perspective.openPopup("CancelRepeatEvent_Warning",'Events/ParticipantEvents/Templates/CancelRepeatEvent_Warning', params = {}, showCloseIcon = False, resizable = False, draggable = False, overlayDismiss = True, modal  = True)
			self.props.params.checked = True

if currentValue.value != -1:
		self.view.refreshBinding('custom.calendarFiller')
self.view.custom.endDateCalender = currentValue.value

props.text: Modify your selection by choosing additional days or removing days.

config.script:
import traceback
	import datetime
	import time
	def calculatenights(day):	
		Sunday = False
		Monday = False
		Tuesday = False
		Wednesday = False
		Thursday = False
		Friday = False
		Saturday = False
		weekday = system.date.getDayOfWeek(day)
		if weekday == 7: 
			Saturday = True
		elif weekday == 1:
			Sunday = True
		elif weekday == 2:
			Monday = True
		elif weekday == 3:
			Tuesday = True
		elif weekday == 4:
			Wednesday = True
		elif weekday == 5:
			Thursday = True
		elif weekday == 6:
			Friday = True					
		nights = 0
		if Sunday: nights += 1
		if Monday: nights += 2
		if Tuesday: nights += 4
		if Wednesday: nights += 8
		if Thursday: nights +=16
		if Friday: nights += 32
		if Saturday: nights += 64	
		return nights
	try:
		self.props.enabled = False
		#Get input values
		eventName = self.parent.parent.getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("EventName_Flex").getChild("EventName").props.params.inputText
		startsOn = self.parent.parent.getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("StartsOn_Date_Flex").getChild("Starts_On_Date").props.params.date
		durationHours = self.parent.parent.getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("Duration_Flex").getChild("Duration").props.params.value
		endsOn = self.parent.parent.getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("EndsOn_Flex").getChild("Ends_On").props.params.date
		categoryId = self.parent.parent.getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("Category_Flex").getChild("Category").props.params.SelectedValue
		locationId = self.parent.parent.getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("Location_Flex").getChild("Location").props.params.SelectedValue
		scheduledWeekdays = self.parent.parent.getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("Schedule_Flex").getChild("Calendar").getChild("Table").props.params.nights
		points = self.parent.parent.getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("Points_Flex").getChild("Points").props.params.value
		description = self.parent.parent.getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("Description_Flex").getChild("description").props.params.inputText
		all_day = self.parent.parent.getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("AllDay_Flex").getChild("AllDay_checkbox").props.params.checked
		timeCreated = system.date.format(system.date.now(),'yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss')	
		participantActive = self.parent.parent.getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("EventActive_Flex").getChild("EventActive").props.params.SelectedValue
		if participantActive == 0:
			timeRetired = system.date.format(system.date.now(),'yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss')
		else:
			timeRetired = None
		Is_Update = self.view.params.IsUpdate
		repeatFrequencyTypeId = self.view.custom.RepeatFrequencyTypeId
		dateSelectionPattern = self.view.custom.pattern
		dateSelectionDays = self.view.custom.EventData.weekdays #self.view.custom.weekdays
		if dateSelectionDays != None and len(dateSelectionDays) > 0:
			dateSelectionDays_Str = '[' + ','.join([str(elem) for elem in dateSelectionDays]) + ']'
		else:
			dateSelectionDays_Str = None
		facilitatorEmployeeId = ''
		facilitatorEmployeeId_list = self.parent.parent.getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("Facilitator_Flex").getChild("facilitator").props.params.selection
		IsEventRepeat = self.parent.parent.getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("EventRepeats_Flex").getChild("EventRepeats_checkbox").props.params.checked
		repeatDateUntil = self.parent.parent.getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("Schedule_Flex").getChild("EndDate").getChild("Ends_On").props.params.date

		if repeatDateUntil!=None and repeatDateUntil!='':
			endsOn_timeFromDate = self.parent.parent.getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("EndsOn_Flex").getChild("Ends_On").props.params.date
			repeatDateUntil = str(system.date.format(repeatDateUntil,'yyyy-MM-dd ')) + str(system.date.format(endsOn_timeFromDate,'hh:mm:ss'))#' 00:00:00'

		NewHostDays = self.parent.parent.getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("Schedule_Flex").getChild("Calendar").getChild("Table").props.params.daysHosting #self.view.custom.calendarFiller
		startYear = self.parent.parent.getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("Schedule_Flex").getChild("Calendar").getChild("Table").props.params.StartYear
		endYear = self.parent.parent.getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("Schedule_Flex").getChild("Calendar").getChild("Table").props.params.EndYear
		
		# calculate nights if repeateEvent false
		nightsForNonRepeateEvent = calculatenights(startsOn)
		
		# attendee categories
		attendeeCategoryIds = self.parent.parent.getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("Attendees_Flex").getChild("attendee").props.params.selection
			
		# Check if compulsory fields are not None
		if eventName == None or eventName == '':
			valid = False
			error_message = "Please fill in the Event Name before saving."
		elif startsOn == None or startsOn == '':
			valid = False
			error_message = "Please select Stars-On Date before saving."
		elif endsOn == None or endsOn == '':
			valid = False
			error_message = "Please select Ends-On Date before saving."
		elif categoryId == None or categoryId == '' or categoryId < 0:
			valid = False
			error_message = "Please select Category before saving."
		elif locationId == None or locationId == '' or locationId < 0:
			valid = False
			error_message = "Please select Loacation before saving."
		elif attendeeCategoryIds == None or attendeeCategoryIds == [] or len(attendeeCategoryIds) == 0:
			valid = False
			error_message = "Please select Attendee before saving."
		else:
			valid = True
			
		### Check if data is valid otherwise show error message.
		if valid:
			if all_day == True:
				all_day = 1
				duration =  system.date.daysBetween(startsOn,endsOn) # diff between startsOn and EndsOn
				startsOn_Old = startsOn
				endsOn_Old = endsOn
				startsOn_time = '00:00:00'
				endsOn_time = '23:59:59'
				startsOn = str(system.date.format(startsOn,'yyyy-MM-dd')) + ' 00:00:00'
				endsOn = str(system.date.format(endsOn,'yyyy-MM-dd')) + ' 23:59:59'
			else:
				all_day = 0
				duration = system.date.daysBetween(startsOn,endsOn) # diff between startsOn and EndsOn
				startsOn_Old = startsOn
				endsOn_Old = endsOn
				startsOn_time = system.date.format(startsOn,'HH:mm:ss')
				endsOn_time = system.date.format(endsOn,'HH:mm:ss')
				startsOn = system.date.format(startsOn,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')
				endsOn = system.date.format(endsOn,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')
			#set backdate limit	
			if startsOn_Old > system.date.now():
				limitDate = startsOn_Old
			else:
				limitDate = system.date.now()
			### Create transaction
			transactionFailed = False
			success = False
			human_id = None
			#txId = system.db.beginTransaction(timeout=50000)
			attendedDates = ''
			try:
				startDateAllow = True
				if Is_Update == False:
					# insert new event in participant.Event table
					parameter = {
								'categoryId':categoryId,
								'eventName':eventName,
								'startsOn':startsOn,
								'endsOn':endsOn,
								'all_day':all_day,
								'description':description,
								'points':points,
								'timeCreated': timeCreated,
								'repeatFrequencyTypeId':repeatFrequencyTypeId,
								'dateSelectionPattern' : dateSelectionPattern,
								'dateSelectionDays' : str(dateSelectionDays_Str),
								'facilitatorEmployeeId' : facilitatorEmployeeId,
								'IsEventRepeat' : IsEventRepeat,
								'repeatDateUntil' : repeatDateUntil,
								'scheduledWeekdays': nightsForNonRepeateEvent if IsEventRepeat==False else scheduledWeekdays,
								'duration_hours': durationHours,
								'locationId': locationId,
								'timeRetired':timeRetired
								}
					system.db.runNamedQuery('Event/ParticipantEvents/Registration/Insert_NewEvent',parameter)
					# get eventId of last added event
					query = "select max(id) from [participant].[Events]"
					result = system.db.runPrepQuery(query)
					eventId = result.getValueAt(0,0)
					result = system.db.runPrepQuery("SELECT startsOn,endsOn FROM participant.Events where id = "+str(eventId))
					event_startDate = result.getValueAt(0,0)
					event_endDate = result.getValueAt(0,1)
					result_DB = system.db.runNamedQuery('Event/ParticipantEvents/Detail/Get_Events_ByEventID',{'eventId':eventId}) # data from db
				else:
					eventId = self.view.params.event_id
					result_DB = system.db.runNamedQuery('Event/ParticipantEvents/Detail/Get_Events_ByEventID',{'eventId':eventId}) # data from db
					# check if participants are attended for the event for earlier dates
					query = "select ea.id as 'attendance' from participant.EventAttendance ea LEFT JOIN [participant].[EventSchedule] e ON ea.scheduleId=e.id WHERE e.timeRetired IS NULL and ea.timeRetired IS NULL and e.eventId =" + str(eventId) + " and e.startsOn < '" + str(system.date.format(startsOn_Old,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')) + "'"
					result = system.db.runPrepQuery(query)
					if result.getRowCount() > 0:
						startDateAllow = False
					
					if startDateAllow == True:
						# update schedule event in participant.EventSchedule table
						result = system.db.runPrepQuery("SELECT startsOn,endsOn FROM participant.Events where id = "+str(eventId))
						event_startDate = result.getValueAt(0,0)
						event_endDate = result.getValueAt(0,1)
						if event_startDate != startsOn or event_endDate != endsOn:
							query = "select startsOn,endsOn,id from [participant].[EventSchedule] where timeRetired IS NULL and eventId =" + str(eventId)
							result = system.db.runPrepQuery(query)
	
							for k in range(0,result.getRowCount()):
								startDate_sql = result.getValueAt(k,0)
								endDate_sql = result.getValueAt(k,1)
								id = result.getValueAt(k,2)
								if (system.date.format(startDate_sql,'dd/MM/yyyy') == system.date.format(event_startDate,'dd/MM/yyyy')): # and system.date.format(endDate_sql,'dd/MM/yyyy') == system.date.format(event_endDate,'dd/MM/yyyy')):
									# if previous and current stardates are different then delete previous date if not attended and then insert new startdate
									if system.date.format(startsOn_Old,'dd/MM/yyyy HH:mm:ss') != system.date.format(startDate_sql,'dd/MM/yyyy HH:mm:ss'):
										checkEventAttended = system.db.runPrepQuery("SELECT * FROM participant.EventAttendance where timeRetired IS NULL and scheduleID = " + str(id))
										if checkEventAttended.getRowCount() > 0:
											pass 
										else:
											parameter = {
														'eventId':eventId,
														'startsOn':startDate_sql,
														'endsOn':endDate_sql
														}
											system.db.runNamedQuery('Event/ParticipantEvents/Registration/Delete_ScheduledEvent',parameter)
											system.perspective.print('delete1')
										#check if date already exist. if not exist then insert else if future date then update else pass
										checkExist = system.db.runPrepQuery("select * from [participant].[EventSchedule] where timeRetired IS NULL and eventId =" + str(eventId) + " and FORMAT(startsOn, 'yyyy-MM-dd') = '" + str(system.date.format(startsOn_Old,'yyyy-MM-dd')) + "'")
										if checkExist.getRowCount() > 0:
											if startDate_sql < limitDate:
												pass
											else:
												# update existing schedule time only if time change from detail registration screen
												if system.date.format(result_DB.getValueAt(0,'startsOn'),'HH:mm:ss') != system.date.format(self.parent.parent.getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("StartsOn_Date_Flex").getChild("Starts_On_Date").props.params.date,'HH:mm:ss'):
													parameter = {
														'eventId':eventId,
														'startsOn':startDate_sql,
														'endsOn':endDate_sql,
														'startsOn_New':startsOn,
														'endsOn_New':endsOn,
														}
													system.db.runNamedQuery('Event/ParticipantEvents/Registration/Update_ScheduledEventDates',parameter)
										else:
											parameter = {
														'eventId':eventId,
														'startsOn':startsOn,
														'endsOn':endsOn,
														'notes':'',
														'timeCreated':timeCreated,
														'duration':durationHours,
														'locationId':locationId,
														'points':points,
														'description':description
														}
#											system.db.runNamedQuery('Event/ParticipantEvents/Registration/Insert_ScheduledEvent',parameter)	
											newScheduleId = system.db.runNamedQuery(path='Event/ParticipantEvents/Registration/Insert_ScheduledEvent',parameters=parameter,getKey=1)	
											# insert facilitator
											for facilitator in facilitatorEmployeeId_list:
												parameter = {'facilitatorHumanId':facilitator,
																	'scheduleId':newScheduleId}

									else:

											pass
										else:
											# update existing schedule time only if time change from detail registration screen
											if system.date.format(result_DB.getValueAt(0,'startsOn'),'HH:mm:ss') != system.date.format(self.parent.parent.getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("StartsOn_Date_Flex").getChild("Starts_On_Date").props.params.date,'HH:mm:ss'):

								elif (system.date.format(startDate_sql,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') < system.date.format(startsOn_Old,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') or system.date.format(endDate_sql,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') < system.date.format(startsOn_Old,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')) and (system.date.format(startDate_sql,'dd/MM/yyyy') != system.date.format(event_startDate,'dd/MM/yyyy') and system.date.format(endDate_sql,'dd/MM/yyyy') != system.date.format(event_endDate,'dd/MM/yyyy')):
									# cancel record for scheduled event in EventScheduled table only if it didn't have attendance
									checkEventAttended = system.db.runPrepQuery("SELECT * FROM participant.EventAttendance where timeRetired IS NULL and scheduleID = " + str(id))
									if checkEventAttended.getRowCount() > 0:
										pass

										parameter = {

													}

										system.perspective.print('delete4')
									#system.perspective.print('deleteToBe: '+str(startDate_sql))
								elif (system.date.format(startDate_sql,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') < system.date.format(limitDate,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') or system.date.format(endDate_sql,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') < system.date.format(limitDate,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')) and (system.date.format(startDate_sql,'dd/MM/yyyy') != system.date.format(event_startDate,'dd/MM/yyyy') and system.date.format(endDate_sql,'dd/MM/yyyy') != system.date.format(event_endDate,'dd/MM/yyyy')):
									pass
								else:
									date = startDate_sql
									start_date = str(system.date.format(date,'yyyy-MM-dd ')) + str(startsOn_time)
									end_date =  str(system.date.format(system.date.addDays(date, duration),'yyyy-MM-dd ')) + str(endsOn_time)
									# update existing schedule time only if time change from detail registration screen
									if system.date.format(result_DB.getValueAt(0,'startsOn'),'HH:mm:ss') != system.date.format(self.parent.parent.getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("StartsOn_Date_Flex").getChild("Starts_On_Date").props.params.date,'HH:mm:ss'):
										parameter = {
											'eventId':eventId,
											'startsOn':startDate_sql,
											'endsOn':endDate_sql,
											'startsOn_New':start_date,
											'endsOn_New':end_date,
											}
										system.db.runNamedQuery('Event/ParticipantEvents/Registration/Update_ScheduledEventDates',parameter)	
										system.perspective.print('update5')										
						# update event in participant.Event table
						parameter = {
									'eventId':eventId,
									'categoryId':categoryId,
									'eventName':eventName,
									'startsOn':startsOn,
									'endsOn':endsOn,
									'all_day':all_day,
									'description':description,
									'points':points,
									'repeatFrequencyTypeId':repeatFrequencyTypeId,
									'dateSelectionPattern' : dateSelectionPattern,
									'dateSelectionDays' : str(dateSelectionDays_Str),
									'facilitatorEmployeeId' : facilitatorEmployeeId,
									'IsEventRepeat' : IsEventRepeat,
									'repeatDateUntil' : repeatDateUntil,
									'scheduledWeekdays': nightsForNonRepeateEvent if IsEventRepeat==False else scheduledWeekdays,
									'duration_hours': durationHours,
									'locationId': locationId,
									'timeRetired': timeRetired
									}
						system.db.runNamedQuery('Event/ParticipantEvents/Registration/Update_Event',parameter)
					else:
						system.perspective.openPopup("EventScheduleDelete_Warning",'Events/ParticipantEvents/Templates/EventScheduleDelete_Warning', params = {}, showCloseIcon = False, resizable = False, draggable = False, overlayDismiss = True, modal  = True)
															
				if startDateAllow == True:		
					# Schedule
					host_days_list = []
					processed_days = []
					if NewHostDays != None:
						for date in NewHostDays:
							start_date = str(system.date.format(date,'yyyy-MM-dd ')) + str(startsOn_time)
							end_date =  str(system.date.format(system.date.addDays(date, duration),'yyyy-MM-dd ')) + str(endsOn_time)
		#					start_date = system.date.format(date,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')
		#					end_date =  system.date.format(system.date.addHours(date, durationHours),'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')
							if system.date.format(date,'yyyy-MM-dd') not in processed_days:
								host_days_list.append((start_date,end_date))
								processed_days.append(system.date.format(date,'yyyy-MM-dd'))
					if (startsOn,endsOn) not in host_days_list:
						host_days_list.append((startsOn,endsOn))
										
					#system.perspective.print('host_days_list: ' + str(host_days_list))

#					query = "select startsOn,endsOn,id from [participant].[EventSchedule] where timeRetired IS NULL and eventId =" + str(eventId)
#					result = system.db.runPrepQuery(query)
					# if  IsEventRepeat = True then insert/remove events for selected evntId, else set timeretired
					if IsEventRepeat == True:
						#insert new schedule
						for i in range(0,len(host_days_list)):
							startDate = host_days_list[i][0]
							endDate = host_days_list[i][1]
							system.perspective.print('insert6 strDate: '+str(startDate))
							Found = False
							#check schedule exist if not then insert
							query = "select startsOn,endsOn,id from [participant].[EventSchedule] where timeRetired IS NULL and eventId =" + str(eventId)
							result = system.db.runPrepQuery(query)
							if result.getRowCount() > 0:
								for j in range(0,result.getRowCount()):
									startDate_sql = system.date.format(result.getValueAt(j,0),'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')
									endDate_sql =  system.date.format(result.getValueAt(j,1),'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')
									if str(system.date.format(system.date.parse(startDate,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'),'yyyy-MM-dd')) == str(system.date.format(result.getValueAt(j,0),'yyyy-MM-dd')): #and str(system.date.format(system.date.parse(endDate,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'),'yyyy-MM-dd')) == str(system.date.format(result.getValueAt(j,1),'yyyy-MM-dd'))):
										Found = True
							# check if date from hostlist in sql or it is event StartsOn/EndsOn date or Is back date
#							if (str(system.date.format(event_startDate,'yyyy-MM-dd')) == str(startDate.split(' ')[0]) and str(system.date.format(event_endDate,'yyyy-MM-dd')) == str(endDate.split(' ')[0])):
#								Found = True
							if (system.date.format(system.date.parse(startDate,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'),'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') < system.date.format(startsOn_Old,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') or system.date.format(system.date.parse(endDate,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'),'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') < system.date.format(startsOn_Old,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')):
								Found = True
							if Found == False:
								# insert record for scheduled event in EventScheduled table
								parameter = {
											'eventId':eventId,
											'startsOn':startDate,
											'endsOn':endDate,
											'notes':'',
											'timeCreated':timeCreated,
											'duration':durationHours,
											'locationId':locationId,
											'points':points,
											'description':description
											}
								newScheduleId = system.db.runNamedQuery(path='Event/ParticipantEvents/Registration/Insert_ScheduledEvent',parameters=parameter,getKey=1)	
								# insert facilitator
								for facilitator in facilitatorEmployeeId_list:
									parameter = {'facilitatorHumanId':facilitator,
														'scheduleId':newScheduleId}
									system.db.runNamedQuery('Event/ParticipantEvents/Registration/Insert_SingleScheduleFacilitator',parameter)
								system.perspective.print('insert6')
								#system.perspective.print('insert1')
						#delete cancelled schedule	
						if result.getRowCount() > 0:
							for j in range(0,result.getRowCount()):
								startDate_sql = system.date.format(result.getValueAt(j,0),'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')
								endDate_sql =  system.date.format(result.getValueAt(j,1),'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')
								id = result.getValueAt(j,2)
								Found = False
								for i in range(0,len(host_days_list)):
									startDate = host_days_list[i][0]
									endDate = host_days_list[i][1]
									if str(system.date.format(system.date.parse(startDate,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'),'yyyy-MM-dd')) == str(system.date.format(result.getValueAt(j,0),'yyyy-MM-dd')) or (system.date.format(result.getValueAt(j,0),'dd/MM/yyyy') == system.date.format(event_startDate,'dd/MM/yyyy') and system.date.format(result.getValueAt(j,1),'dd/MM/yyyy') == system.date.format(event_endDate,'dd/MM/yyyy')):
										Found = True
								if Found == False:
									# cancel record for scheduled event in EventScheduled table only if it didn't have attendance
									checkEventAttended = system.db.runPrepQuery("SELECT * FROM participant.EventAttendance where timeRetired IS NULL and scheduleID = " + str(id))
									if checkEventAttended.getRowCount() > 0:
										pass 
									else:
										parameter = {
													'eventId':eventId,
													'startsOn':startDate_sql,
													'endsOn':endDate_sql
													}
										system.db.runNamedQuery('Event/ParticipantEvents/Registration/Delete_ScheduledEvent',parameter)	
										system.perspective.print('delete7')
					else: # if repeate Event checkbox not selected
						#insert new schedule for startdate
						query = "select startsOn,endsOn,id from [participant].[EventSchedule] where timeRetired IS NULL and eventId =" + str(eventId)
						result = system.db.runPrepQuery(query)
						startDate_sql = startsOn
						endDate_sql = endsOn
						for i in range(0,len(host_days_list)):
							startDate = host_days_list[i][0]
							endDate = host_days_list[i][1]
							Found = False
							if result.getRowCount() > 0:
								for j in range(0,result.getRowCount()):
									startDate_sql = system.date.format(result.getValueAt(j,0),'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')
									endDate_sql =  system.date.format(result.getValueAt(j,1),'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')
									if str(system.date.format(system.date.parse(startDate,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'),'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')) == str(startDate_sql) and str(system.date.format(system.date.parse(endDate,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'),'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')) == str(endDate_sql):
										Found = True
							if Found == False:
								# insert record for scheduled event in EventScheduled table
								parameter = {
											'eventId':eventId,
											'startsOn':startDate,
											'endsOn':endDate,
											'notes':'',
											'timeCreated':timeCreated,
											'duration':durationHours,
											'locationId':locationId,
											'points':points,
											'description':description
											}
								newScheduleId = system.db.runNamedQuery(path='Event/ParticipantEvents/Registration/Insert_ScheduledEvent',parameters=parameter,getKey=1)	
								# insert facilitator
								for facilitator in facilitatorEmployeeId_list:
									parameter = {'facilitatorHumanId':facilitator,
														'scheduleId':newScheduleId}
									system.db.runNamedQuery('Event/ParticipantEvents/Registration/Insert_SingleScheduleFacilitator',parameter)
								system.perspective.print('insert8')
							else:
								#update date if future date
								if (startDate_sql < system.date.format(limitDate,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') or endDate_sql < system.date.format(limitDate,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')):
									pass
								else:
									# update existing schedule time only if time change from detail registration screen
									if system.date.format(result_DB.getValueAt(0,'startsOn'),'HH:mm:ss') != system.date.format(self.parent.parent.getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("StartsOn_Date_Flex").getChild("Starts_On_Date").props.params.date,'HH:mm:ss'):
										parameter = {
											'eventId':eventId,
											'startsOn':startDate_sql,
											'endsOn':endDate_sql,
											'startsOn_New':startDate,
											'endsOn_New':endDate,
											}
										system.db.runNamedQuery('Event/ParticipantEvents/Registration/Update_ScheduledEventDates',parameter)
										system.perspective.print('update9')
								
						if result.getRowCount() > 0:
							for j in range(0,result.getRowCount()):
								startDate_sql = result.getValueAt(j,0)
								endDate_sql =  result.getValueAt(j,1)
								if (system.date.format(startDate_sql,'yyyy-MM-dd') != system.date.format(event_startDate,'yyyy-MM-dd') and system.date.format(endDate_sql,'yyyy-MM-dd') != system.date.format(event_endDate,'yyyy-MM-dd')) and (system.date.format(startDate_sql,'yyyy-MM-dd') != system.date.format(startsOn_Old,'yyyy-MM-dd') or system.date.format(endDate_sql,'yyyy-MM-dd') != system.date.format(endsOn_Old,'yyyy-MM-dd')):
									# cancel record for scheduled event in EventScheduled table
									parameter = {
												'eventId':eventId,
												'startsOn':startDate_sql,
												'endsOn':endDate_sql
												}
									system.db.runNamedQuery('Event/ParticipantEvents/Registration/Delete_ScheduledEvent',parameter) 
									system.perspective.print('delete10')
									#system.perspective.print('delete2')
							# set repeat event pattern and daySelection to NULL
							system.db.runPrepUpdate("UPDATE participant.Events SET dateSelectionPattern = NULL, dateSelectionDays = NULL where id = "+str(eventId))				
					
					# Get all schedule instances and update duration/location/points/description for each instance in EventScheduled table 
					## update only if value on screen is different from database value
					## update the attendee categories if there is change or new event is being created
					attendeeCategoryIds_DB = []
					if result_DB.getValueAt(0,'attendeeCategories') != None and result_DB.getValueAt(0,'attendeeCategories') != '' and result_DB.getValueAt(0,'attendeeCategories') != 'None':
						attendeeCategories = (result_DB.getValueAt(0,'attendeeCategories')).replace('[','')
						attendeeCategories = attendeeCategories.replace(']','')
						splittedList = attendeeCategories.split(',')
						for k in range(0,len(splittedList)):
							attendeeCategory = splittedList[k]
							if attendeeCategory != None and attendeeCategory != '':
								attendeeCategoryIds_DB.append(int(attendeeCategory))
					else:
						attendeeCategoryIds_DB = []
					
					
					if list(attendeeCategoryIds) != list(attendeeCategoryIds_DB):
						# delete old records for event
						parameter = {
									'eventId':eventId
									}
						system.db.runNamedQuery('Event/ParticipantEvents/Registration/Delete_EventAttendeeCategories',parameter)	 
						
						for attendeeCategoryId in attendeeCategoryIds:
							# insert new records to set facilitator for event
							parameter = {
										'eventId':eventId,
										'attendeeCategoryId':attendeeCategoryId
										}
							system.db.runNamedQuery('Event/ParticipantEvents/Registration/Insert_EventAttendeeCategory',parameter)	 
		
					# get list of facilitator
					facilitatorHumanIds_DB = []
					if result_DB.getValueAt(0,'facilitatorHumanId') != None and result_DB.getValueAt(0,'facilitatorHumanId') != '' and result_DB.getValueAt(0,'facilitatorHumanId') != 'None':
						facilitatorHumanIds = (result_DB.getValueAt(0,'facilitatorHumanId')).replace('[','')
						facilitatorHumanIds = facilitatorHumanIds.replace(']','')
						splittedList = facilitatorHumanIds.split(',')
						for k in range(0,len(splittedList)):
							facilitatorHumanId = splittedList[k]
							if facilitatorHumanId != None and facilitatorHumanId != '':
								facilitatorHumanIds_DB.append(int(facilitatorHumanId))
					else:
						facilitatorHumanIds_DB = []
										
#					parameter = {
#								'duration':durationHours,
#								'locationId':locationId,
#								'points':points,
#								'description':description,
#								'eventId' :eventId,
#								'limitDate' :system.date.format(limitDate,'yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss')
#								}
#					system.db.runNamedQuery('Event/ParticipantEvents/Registration/Update_ScheduledEvent',parameter)	 

					## update schedule values only if it change from detail screen
					limitDate_formated = system.date.format(limitDate,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')
					if result_DB.getValueAt(0,'duration_hours') != durationHours:
						system.db.runPrepUpdate("UPDATE [participant].[EventSchedule] SET duration = "+str(durationHours)+" WHERE id in (select id from participant.EventSchedule where [eventId] = "+str(eventId)+" and [timeRetired] IS NULL) and [startsOn] >= '"+str(limitDate_formated)+"'")
					if result_DB.getValueAt(0,'locationId') != locationId:
						system.db.runPrepUpdate("UPDATE [participant].[EventSchedule] SET locationId = "+str(locationId)+" WHERE id in (select id from participant.EventSchedule where [eventId] = "+str(eventId)+" and [timeRetired] IS NULL) and [startsOn] >= '"+str(limitDate_formated)+"'")
					if result_DB.getValueAt(0,'points') != points:	
						system.db.runPrepUpdate("UPDATE [participant].[EventSchedule] SET points = "+str(points)+" WHERE id in (select id from participant.EventSchedule where [eventId] = "+str(eventId)+" and [timeRetired] IS NULL) and [startsOn] >= '"+str(limitDate_formated)+"'")
					if result_DB.getValueAt(0,'description') != description:
						system.db.runPrepUpdate("UPDATE [participant].[EventSchedule] SET description = '"+str(description)+"' WHERE id in (select id from participant.EventSchedule where [eventId] = "+str(eventId)+" and [timeRetired] IS NULL) and [startsOn] >= '"+str(limitDate_formated)+"'")
					
					## update facilitator only if facilitator change
					if list(facilitatorEmployeeId_list) != list(facilitatorHumanIds_DB):
						# delete old records for event
						parameter = {
									'eventId':eventId
									}
						system.db.runNamedQuery('Event/ParticipantEvents/Registration/Delete_EventFacilitators',parameter)	 
						# delete old records for each schedule
						parameter = {
									'eventId':eventId,
									'limitDate':system.date.format(limitDate,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')
									}
						system.db.runNamedQuery('Event/ParticipantEvents/Registration/Delete_AllScheduleFacilitator',parameter)	 	
						for facilitator in facilitatorEmployeeId_list:
							# insert new records to set facilitator for event
							parameter = {
										'eventId':eventId,
										'facilitatorHumanId':facilitator
										}
							system.db.runNamedQuery('Event/ParticipantEvents/Registration/Insert_EventFacilitator',parameter)	 
							# insert new records to set facilitator for each schedule
							parameter = {
										'eventId':eventId,
										'facilitatorHumanId':facilitator,
										'limitDate':system.date.format(limitDate,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')
										}
							system.db.runNamedQuery('Event/ParticipantEvents/Registration/Insert_AllScheduleFacilitator',parameter)	 			
											
			#Transaction failure :(
			except:
				transactionFailed = True
				logger = system.util.getLogger("Events RegisterEvent Button Save")
				msg = traceback.format_exc()
				logger.error(msg)
				
			### Check if an error occured rollback the transaction
			if transactionFailed:
				#system.db.rollbackTransaction(txId)
				payload = {'message':"Something went wrong while saving data. Please try again."}
				system.perspective.sendMessage("showError", payload=payload, scope="view")
			### Otherwise commit 
			else:
				#Success!!!!
				#system.db.commitTransaction(txId)
				if startDateAllow != True:
					message = '' #"Event updated Successfully.\n *(Can't delete date(s) [" + str(attendedDates[:-1]) + '] as participants attended event for these dates.'
				else:
					message = "Event updated Successfully."
				payload = {'message':message}
				system.perspective.sendMessage("showError", payload=payload, scope="view")
				system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType="reloadEventData", payload={}, scope="session")
				success = True
			### Always close the transaction	
			#system.db.closeTransaction(txId)
			# If successful reset and close the dock
			if success:
				self.view.params.func_new_data = False
				system.perspective.sendMessage("ResetSearch", payload={}, scope="session")
				system.perspective.sendMessage("ResetRegistration", payload={}, scope="session")
				time.sleep(2)
				system.perspective.closeDock('RegisterEvent')
				# refresh overview table
				system.perspective.sendMessage("refreshEvents", payload=payload, scope="session")
				#Go to the detail view
				tab_id = 2 # registration
				#system.perspective.navigate("Events/Detail/" + str(eventId) + "/" + str(tab_id))
				
		
		else:
			payload = {'message':error_message}
			system.perspective.sendMessage("showError", payload=payload, scope="view")
		self.props.enabled = True
	except:
		logger = system.util.getLogger("Events Register Event Save Button")
		msg = traceback.format_exc()
		self.props.enabled = True
		logger.error(msg)

self.view.params.func_new_data = False
	system.perspective.sendMessage("ResetSearch", payload={}, scope="session")
	system.perspective.sendMessage("ResetRegistration", payload={}, scope="session")
	system.perspective.closeDock('RegisterEvent')

messageHandlers.script:

	system.perspective.print(payload['message'])
	self.props.text = payload['message']
	self.position.display = True
	time.sleep(5)
	self.position.display = False
